p: In this work, N. damascena essential oil was shown to be a new, abundant source of β-elemene. The high purity β-elemene was successfully isolated from this EO for the first time. High-performance counter-current chromatography was proved to be an efficient technique for this sesquiterpene separation, while antimicrobial testing revealed moderate activity of β-elemene against Mycobacterium tuberculosis H37Ra.
